content: simple six petal flower by jessica felton this simple little flower is quick and easy to make add a button for the centre and use it to embellish whatever you can think of notes this pattern uses american crochet terms row 1 chain 4 and slip_stitch into the first chain to form a loop chain 1 then into the loop work 6 single crochet slip_stitch to the first single_crochet worked 6 single_crochet row 2 chain 1 work 2 single_crochet into the same stitch where you just slip stitched work 2 single_crochet into each of the next 5 single_crochet slip_stitch to the first single_crochet worked 12 single_crochet row 3 starting the petals chain 2 work 1 double_crochet and 1 treble_crochet into the same stitch where you just slip stitched work 1 treble_crochet and 1 double_crochet into the next stitch chain 2 and slip_stitch back into the same stitch just worked petal one finished slip_stitch into the next stitch chain 2 work 1 double_crochet and one treble_crochet into the same stitch work 1 treble_crochet and one double_crochet into the next stitch chain 2 and slip_stitch back into the same stitch just worked petal two finished work the next four petals in the same way finish off and weave in loose ends
